headline: NYPD person of interest Frank R. Jamesâ€™ YouTube tirades about race, guns and Eric Adams exposed
author: Jorge Fitz-Gibbon &
sentences: So I sat down with them, and pointed out that we took care of dependents at the dispensary (one of whom was the 14 year old girl who was dating Elvis Presley, and would go on to marry him, but that's another story ) and that if one of the blacks were to use that that m...fer term, much trouble would ensue.
His name indicates that he was not born in the Ghetto but that might be because he was born and named before the Africanization and Dumbification of black names began.
Not only that, but how could he shoot ten people with a firearm at close range in a crowded subway car, by firing 32 rounds, and not murder (kill) any of them?
Well there is little doubt that Frank James is one of the most incompetent criminal nut jobs to pop up in the naked city (NYC) in recent history.
By leaving such obvious clues, it looks like James actually intended to be arrested, or become a suicide victim by cop in the near future.
Since everyone would know what pineapple signified, they could still josh with each other, without getting into trouble.
By leaving his rented U-haul van key, his credit card, and his firearm at the scene of his criminal activities.
This guy covers every liberal object of honor except being a tranny but that might surface as well.
This incident would have been much better for New York if the shooter had been White.
I was stationed at Weisbaden Air Base, Germany, 1959,at the Base Medical Clinic.
And I took note of their use of the term m...rfer as they addressed each other.
Some of my barracks mates were black, and I got along with all of them.
Mental illness is no excuse for bad grammar.
So I proposed a substitute word - pineapple.
